content.question: The data for the acceleration a(t) of a car from 0 to 6 seconds are given in the table above. If the velocity at t=0 is 11 feet per second, the approximate value of the velocity at t=6, computed using a left-hand Riemann sum with three subintervals of equal length, is

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
